ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a further exception to this rule... All weapons skills. Weapon skill max is class dependant... ie. Warrior types weapon skill max is (5 x level)+5,
ygData.messageBody:
There is a further exception to this rule... All
weapons skills. Weapon skill max is class dependant...
ie. Warrior types weapon skill max is (5 x level)+5,
Cleric types is (4 x level)+4 and Mage types is (3 x
level) + 3.

--- RPGFan@... wrote:
> From: RPGFan@...
>
> Actually... Sorry to nit-pick, but your skill cap
> IS, indeed, your level
> times five plus five EXCEPT for two skills. The two
> skills in question being
> Offense and Defense. These skills' caps for your
> level is just five times
> your level, not the additional plus five. Just
> thought I'd throw that
> in...don't beat me. :-)
>
> Lexcanium MacCrege
> Holy Knight of Erollisi Marr
> Paladin of the twelfth rank
>
